name: Ghost of the City
description: In this cocktail from Brandon Burkart of Haddingtons in Austin, Low Gap White Whiskey delivers crisp flavors with the help of Cocchi Americano and lemon bitters.
recipeIngredient: 2 ounces white whiskey, such as Low Gap

recipeInstructions.text: Fill a mixing glass with ice. Add white whiskey, Cocchi Americano, and lemon bitters. Stir for 15 seconds.
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with cherry and serve straight up.
